Articles.Content:
##I found a copy of the old enhanced navball plugin hidden away in my steam folder so deleting that appears to have solved the issue. If anyone else experiences this problem just check your 'plugins' folder for old mods##

Hi everyone,

Since installing 0.90.0 (yeow!) I have had a problem in that all of the markers on the navball pile up on the heading marker (see picture).

I've tried uninstalling and fresh installing and all that jazz and no dice. anyone else experience this issue and have a solution? Thanks.

Cas.

Edited December 18, 2014 by Carsogen
Fixed

##Solved, see above##

Update: After upgrading the tracking station to lvl 2 and mission control (contracts) to lvl 2, the problem has fixed itself. I'm not sure which did it though unfortunately.

Cas.

Edited December 17, 2014 by Carsogen
